en.text:
I’m a **full-stack developer** with **4 years of experience** building secure, efficient applications using Node.js, React, Docker, and Kubernetes.

Currently, I’m a part-time cybersecurity student specializing in **penetration testing**, with hands-on expertise in Metasploit and Nmap. I’m passionate about identifying vulnerabilities and strengthening system defenses.
